Affix.Name: Gambler
Affix.Desc: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

EQUIP_RING.Name: Gambler's Dice Cup
EQUIP_RING.Desc: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

EQUIP_NECKLACE.Name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
EQUIP_NECKLACE.Desc: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

EQUIP_DRESS.Name: Gambler's Earrings
EQUIP_DRESS.Desc: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

EQUIP_BRACER.Name: Gambler's Brooch
EQUIP_BRACER.Desc: A big, luxurious flower that can hide loaded dice.

EQUIP_SHOES.Name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
EQUIP_SHOES.Desc: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.
